tool_description: Get a random quote about mindfulness from a list of 100 quotes.
title: MetaAPI Mindfulness Quotes

api_list.name: getMindfulnessQuote
api_list.description: Get a random quote about mindfulness from a list of 100 quotes.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://metaapi-mindfulness-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/v1/mindfulness"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "metaapi-mindfulness-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
